sentences.en: " It's raining , it's raining. That's a good omen, it means you will thrive from now on.
sentences.cn: “ 下雨了,下雨了, 这是你们家里此后会有滋长的预兆. ”

sentences.en: Could this at last be a good omen for peace?
sentences.cn: 这是否终于可以视作和平的吉兆了？

sentences.en: Her appearance at this moment is an omen of disaster.
sentences.cn: 她在此刻出现预示着一场灾难。

sentences.en: I took it as a good omen.
sentences.cn: 我把这事看作是个好兆头.

sentences.en: I will accept the gift as an omen from Fortune herself!
sentences.cn: 我将把那礼物看作来自命运女神的预兆而收下!

sentences.en: It is said to be an omen of misfortune.
sentences.cn: 那被认为是一种不幸的先兆.

sentences.en: It was an omen among omens , pointing a path for him to tread.
sentences.cn: 这是预兆中的预兆, 指引着他走一条路.

sentences.en: Omen of Clarity - You may get a few Clearcasting procs here and there.
sentences.cn: 清晰预兆 - 你能时不时得到节能施法的机会.

sentences.en: Some people consider a black cat a creature of ill omen.
sentences.cn: 有些人认为黑猫是不祥的兆头.

sentences.en: Ten weeks later, those first four starts seem more like an omen.
sentences.cn: 十周后, 那前四场先发更像是个预兆.

sentences.en: The car won’t start. Do you think it’s an omen?
sentences.cn: 汽车发动不起来。你觉得这是某种预兆吗？

sentences.en: The omen of bankruptcy hung over the company.
sentences.cn: 那家公司出现了破产的预兆。

sentences.en: The superstitious regard it as a bad omen.
sentences.cn: 迷信的人认为那是一种恶兆.

sentences.en: The unusually heavy rainfall was an ill omen for the travellers.
sentences.cn: 异乎寻常的大雨是旅行者的不祥之兆.

sentences.en: They don't even allow that word like it an omen!
sentences.cn: 他们甚至不允许这个词的存在,好像它是个预兆似的!

trans.tran_en: a sign of what will happen in the future
